name: Woman In Red
description:
EXPLORE THE IMLEK TOWN!

FEATURES:

1. RANDOM LOOTS:

- MINING WITH PICKAXES

- FISHING WITH A FISHING ROPE AND A WORM

(PRESS AND HOLD  ENTER WHEN "!" IS APPEAR!)

2. SIX DUNGEONS

(FINISH A DUNGEON TO GET TO THE NEXT DUNGEON UNTIL THE ENDS!)

3. RANDOM LOOT CHEST

(OPEN IT WITH A KEY)

4. QUEST SCROLL

(TALK WITH PEOPLE TO GET A QUEST!)

5. ANGPAO/RED LETTER

(USE IT TO GET SOME YUAN!)

6. FARMING

(BUY FARM PLOTS TO GROW SOME CROPS!)

7.  SAVING AND TELEPORTATION

(USE A SCARLET ON RED CRYSTAL TO GET SAVING AND TELEPORTATION)
